title: what font is it?
content:
Hi  
Does anyone know what font is used in Wai Wai?  
Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waiwai_3694.jpg)
author: tonestray

comments.content: ah.. pretty sure that's just Calibri Bold which is the one of the default fonts shipped with Microsoft Office 2007 (and possibly windows vista).. A quick check at myfonts.com's What the Font would possibly confirm this...
